channel.title: Very good source 317 ancient curses,Overloads,pvp armours, ep system and more
channel.description:
Features: -Project Insanity Base -Working spirit shield effects -All Dupes Fixed -Fully working Godwars -EP system -2 Quest just for fun with good rewards -Ice cave minigame -Steel drags drop chaotic, Irons drop imbued/Anchor, and bronze drop sol and robin. -Black Elite Armour -Working Overloads and extreme pots -Amazing starter -The pics explain the rest

item.title: Very good source 317 ancient curses,Overloads,pvp armours, ep system and more
item.dc:creator: @riku9182 riku9182
item.description:
@riku9182 wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”][quote author=riku9182 link=topic=467800.msg3433082#msg3433082 date=1292528505]

[quote author=I Vain I link=topic=467800.msg3433011#msg3433011 date=1292523146]

Looks exactly like a normal PI source but with EP which I am pretty sure you ripped.

I am sick of seeing normal PI bases.

So your telling me most NORMAL PI Source’s have Curses, SkillCape Emotes, an EP System, Ancient Warrior Weapon’s and Armour?
Dont think so bro.
[/quote]Let me correct you.

ALL PI sources have curses (unless removed), just the client uses different interfaces, so the action buttons are incorrect.

All PI’s have skill cape emotes, unless using a different client. (NICKs had it by default)

The EP system was ripped from another server.

Ancient warrior’s weapon/armor can be added within seconds.

It can be added, But does it have it? No
[/quote]Most have them, but the original did not.[/quote]
Most, but not all

Read full topic
